name: Golf Hop
description:
GOLF HOP!

Initially created for Android devices this is a PC build to spread the fun to pc as well.

Hop from flag to flag aiming for a highscore. 

-Tip-

Watch out for the birds!

-Controls-

Left Click (HOLD) to charge the power bar

Left Click (Release) to launch the ball

-Bugs-

If you achieve your highscore it will only increase your highscore by one
